metadata.name: HackTool - Koadic Execution
metadata.comment: Detects command line parameters used by Koadic hack tool

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (activity_id = 1 AND endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\\\cmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/q')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('/c')) AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('chcp')))

output.summary: Detects command line parameters used by Koadic hack tool

metadata.objective: Examine fields: process.cmd_line, process.parent_process.cmd_line False positive: Unknown References: https://unit42.paloaltonetworks.com/unit42-sofacy-groups-parallel-attacks/, https://github.com/offsecginger/koadic/blob/457f9a3ff394c989cdb4c599ab90eb34fb2c762c/data/stager/js/stdlib.js, https://blog.f-secure.com/hunting-for-koadic-a-com-based-rootkit/
